config_part.ioc_details: SM300 motor controller used for sample changer

macro.name: MTRCTRL
macro.description: Controller number used in motor address assignment

macro.name: PORT
macro.description: Serial COM port

macro.name: BAUD
macro.description: Baud rate (default: 9600)

macro.name: BITS
macro.description: Data bits (default: 8)

macro.name: PARITY
macro.description: Parity (default: none)

macro.name: STOP
macro.description: Stop bits (default: 2)

macro.name: AXIS1
macro.description: Motor is attached to axis 1 (default: no)

macro.name: AXIS2
macro.description: Motor is attached to axis 2 (default: no)

macro.name: AXIS3
macro.description: Motor is attached to axis 3 (default: no)

macro.name: AXIS4
macro.description: Motor is attached to axis 4 (default: no)

macro.name: AXIS5
macro.description: Motor is attached to axis 5 (default: no)

macro.name: AXIS6
macro.description: Motor is attached to axis 6 (default: no)

macro.name: AXIS7
macro.description: Motor is attached to axis 7 (default: no)

macro.name: AXIS8
macro.description: Motor is attached to axis 8 (default: no)

macro.name: VELO1
macro.description: Velocity, mm/s, set in driver to hard coded value (default: 1)
